content:
Based on FHIR#18921, FHIR#20985, and FHIR#26215, it seems like the DaVinci projects have settled on using "payer" (vs "payor"). However, I noticed that the base Coverage resource is still using "payor"...is there an open jira issue of this and is there and appetite to change it?
http://build.fhir.org/coverage-definitions.html#Coverage.payor
For davinci or for the base Coverage resource? I don't care so much which term is used, I was just thinking it should be consistent...
Based on those DaVinci issues, I'm guessing "payer" would be preferred, so I opened FHIR#27881 against the core spec
For the base resource. Requirement is that we use U.S. spelling in resource names and descriptions

@Lloyd McKenzie
Can we make this change in 4.x?
Can't make substantive changes to a published release. Fixing the name would be a breaking change.
